subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The third-seeded Maria Sharapova, the Wimbledon champion in 2004, lost to Michelle Larcher de Brito of Portugal in the second round at the All England Club.
snippet: The third-seeded Maria Sharapova, the Wimbledon champion in 2004, lost to Michelle Larcher de Brito of Portugal in the second round at the All England Club.
